duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the financial analysis function and partner with the executives, board members, and investment teams.
Drive key initiative analysis, including support M&A, and lead build-out of financial and operational KPI tracking.
Develop and report key financial and operational data/metrics in dashboards and forecasts, driving automation and systems optimization.
Conduct financial cost/benefit analyses to help evaluate and prioritize growth and strategic initiatives.
Manage and direct day-to-day financial reporting systems, and develop or implement systems for scalability.
Maintain and update the company’s regular lender reporting packages.
Lead annual budgeting, reforecasting, and ongoing cash flow forecasting processes.
Collaborate with management to develop budget with buy-in across the Company.
Partner with Information Technology team to ensure state-of-the-art systems and tools are implemented and functioning.
Collaborate with managers, operations team, and key constituents to enhance operational efficiency.
Assist in acquisition financial diligence work streams and lead financial integration of acquired practices.
Analyze cash flow, cost control and expenses, and suggest and implement improvements.
Perform economic and industry analyses and recommend response strategies to trends impacting the business.
Research and investigate financial and operational performance variance issues and assist in corrective actions.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree in finance or accounting. MBA highly desirable.
